Title: A Wrench in the Works
Description:
Looks like the High Speaker is addressing his workers.  It seems something has finally shaken them from their complacency, and their time away from the Awakening Machine is affecting them.

<Moira pauses to brush a bit of dust off her robe.>

Perhaps this would be a good opportunity for everyone to hear what they have to say?

We should convince a few of these Machine Speakers to speak up.
ObjectivesText: Encourage members of the crowd to air their grievances.
RewardText: Excellent, now we're starting to make some progress.
